channel.title: debplate - Template system for Debian packages
channel.description:
> This is a template system for Debian packages, primarily intended to ease building multiple similar binary packages from a single source. With some changes, it could also be useful for making multiple source packages consistent
https://www.decadent.org.uk/ben/blog/introducing-debplate-a-template-system-for-debian-packages.html

item.title: debplate - Template system for Debian packages
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
This is a template system for Debian packages, primarily intended to ease building multiple similar binary packages from a single source. With some changes, it could also be useful for making multiple source packages consistent
